EN.USER_SUCCESSFULLY_ADDED_EMAIL: User created successfully, please check your email for verification
EN.USER_SUCCESSFULLY_ADDED_MOBILE: User created successfully, please check your phone for verification
EN.DATABASE_UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown MongoDB error, please try again later
EN.SIGNUP_NO_PASSWORD: You did not enter your password
EN.SIGNUP_INVALID_PASSWORD: You have entered an invalid password
EN.SIGNUP_NO_EMAIL: You did not enter your email
EN.SIGNUP_INVALID_EMAIL: You have entered an invalid email
EN.SIGNUP_NO_USERNAME: You did not enter your username
EN.SIGNUP_INVALID_USERNAME: You have entered an invalid username
EN.SIGNUP_IP_TIMEOUT: You need to wait {0}ms to create a new account with this ip
EN.SIGNUP_MAX_ACC_IP: This IP has been used too manytimes for new accounts, if this is a public IP, or an error, please email the admin
EN.MISSING_TOKEN: You did not supply a token
EN.INVALID_TOKEN: You have supplied an invalid token
EN.INVALID_USER_ID: You have supplied an invalid user id
EN.INVALID_PASSWORD: You have entered an invalid password, you have {0} attempts left
EN.MISSING_CONTENT_TYPE: You did not supply a content type (&type=X)
EN.INVALID_PERMISSION_NAME: You have supplied an invalid permission name
EN.INVALID_PERMISSION_VALUE: You have supplied an invalid permission value
EN.EMAIL_INVALID: You have entered an invalid email
EN.PASSWORD_INVALID: You have entered an invalid password
EN.USER_NAME_INVALID: You have entered an invalid username
EN.IP_ACCOUNT_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached the maximum number of accounts allowed from this IP
EN.IP_TIMEOUT_REACHED: A new account can only be created in {0} secconds from this IP
EN.TOKEN_GENERATION_FAILED: Token generation failed, but your account has been created, please try and login
EN.IP_BANNED: Your ip has been banned from registering
EN.NOT_IMPLEMENTED: This feature is not implemented yet
EN.INVALID_DISCORD_CODE: You have entered an invalid discord code
EN.INVALID_DISCORD_GRANT: You have entered an invalid discord grant
EN.INVALID_RESPONSE_DISCORD: We have received an invalid response from the discord api
EN.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown error, please try again later
